title: How to make a downloaded mp3 file be selectable as a ringtone on the Pixel 3a XL?
content: With previous phones I've owned, copying an mp3 file to the phone's ringtones folder would allow it to be selected as the phone ringtone. On my new Pixel 3a XL, I used the stock Files app to copy an mp3 file from the Download folder to the Ringtones folder, but the file does not appear in the list of ringtones on the Settings->Sound->Phone Ringtone page, even after a reboot.  So how does one set a mp3 file as a ringtone in the Pixel 3a XL?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a XL
